content: Ok, Now I don't get it. The tough talk has turned to we can't stop them. What the heck? Just a week ago I read news articles saying the military was ready to shoot it down should they launch and today it's a completly different story? Makes no since! "http://www.foxnews.com/politics/first100days/2009/03/29/gates-prepared-respond-north-korea-missile-launch/"

title: Gates: U.S. Not Prepared to Respond to North Korea Missile Launch

content: quote: Originally posted by crackerjacks61: Ok, Now I don't get it. The tough talk has turned to we can't stop them. What the heck? Just a week ago I read news articles saying the military was ready to shoot it down should they launch and today it's a completly different story? Makes no since! "http://www.foxnews.com/politics/first100days/2009/03/29/gates-prepared-respond-north-korea-missile-launch/" CJ,you really need to read the entire article and breathe before responding. The article says this: (Quote)The United States can do nothing to stop North Korea from breaking international law in the next 10 days by firing a missile that is unlikely to be shot down by the U.S. or its allies, Defense Secretary Robert Gates said Sunday. He didn't say that we couldn't shoot the dam thing down. However, I believe I heard in passing that we wouldn't shoot it down? (Quote)Makes no since!(Quote) BTW, it's spelled 'sense'!

He didn't say that we couldn't shoot the dam thing down. However, I believe I heard in passing that we wouldn't shoot it down? (Quote)Makes no since!(Quote) BTW, it's spelled 'sense'!
